Title: Excludes seasonal or temporary tenancies from the provisions regulating deposits and advances for permanent residential dwelling units
Summary: Excludes seasonal or temporary tenancies for a period of one hundred twenty days from the provisions regulating deposits and advances for permanent residential dwelling units.
LawCode: Amd ยง7-108, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to excluding seasonal or temporary tenancies from the provisions regulating deposits and advances for permanent residential dwelling units
